E.g. Resource Manager can create report, which will some up all reported by his/her subordinates hours from all PMC instances including vacations, which is really convenient and allows to see all the reported time in one place.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
